  • Constructor Details

    • Domain

      public Domain​(java.lang.String levelName)
      The Domain initializes with a board or save game from Persistence, this is the only req. for the Domain to launch.
      Parameters:
      levelName - - the name of the pathway to a level or save file to load.

  • Method Details

    • moveActor

      public void moveActor​(Actor actor, Direction direction)
      Core method that handles the actor movement and checks for exceptions. More formally this moves the given Actor in the given Direction if and only if: The game is running, the input parameters are not null, and the movement specified meets all criteria of the Board.validMove() contract. If this contract is met: - The actor will be moved. - Endgame state will be checked for. - Item interaction will occur, if possible.
      Parameters:
      actor - - any type of actor enemy or player.
      direction - - the way it moves.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalStateException - - if the game is not running when this move is attempted.
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - - if the specified actor or direction are null.

    • anotherEnemyInThisSpace

      public static Actor anotherEnemyInThisSpace​(java.util.List<Actor> actors, Coordinate moveToCoordinate)
      Simple utility method to check a location for enemy actors. More formally this will return the first Actor from the list of actors given in the specified coordinate, or return null if none is found.
      Parameters:
      moveToCoordinate - - the coordinate to check.
      Returns:
      - returns null for no enemies, otherwise returns the enemy.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - - if the specified actors or coordinate are null.

    • randomlyMoveActor

      public static Direction randomlyMoveActor()
      Side method that handles random movement. This is called by a tick event in app for other actors/enemies.
      Returns:
      - a random Direction coordinate.

    • getActorByID

      public Actor getActorByID​(java.lang.String ID)
      Get an actor from the board (hero or enemy) by ID. More formally this method will return an Actor from the Domain where the ID parameter equals the ID of the actor. Or return null if none is found.
      Parameters:
      ID - - string ID.
      Returns:
      - an Actor found or null.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - - if the specified ID is null.

    • interactWithItem

      public void interactWithItem​(Actor actor)
      When you step on an item you interact with the item.
      Parameters:
      actor - - the actor moved.

    • checkForEndGame

      public void checkForEndGame​(Actor actor, Coordinate moveToCoordinate)
      When you make a move there is the potential for the game to be over.
      Parameters:
      actor - - the actor moved.
      moveToCoordinate - - the coordinate moved into.
